statements: DELETE FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE efficiency > 0.8 AND storage_capacity < 1000
DELETE FROM efficiency_records WHERE system_id = 1 AND efficiency_percent < 90;
DELETE FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE efficiency_rating IS NULL OR storage_capacity <= 5000;
DELETE FROM PowerUsage WHERE system_id = 1 AND usage_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM PowerGeneration WHERE power_generated < 100 AND generation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM power_measurements WHERE system_id = 1 AND power_generated < 1000
DELETE FROM battery_health WHERE system_id = 5 AND health_status = 'warning';
